ygData.subject: Brute Chopper Info?
ygData.msgSnippet: Time for a weapon upgrade for this 14th level Dwarven Paladin. I prefer to use axes (at least until I git me hands on a Holy Sword :), so I was lookin at the
ygData.messageBody:
Time for a weapon upgrade for this 14th level Dwarven Paladin.
I prefer to use axes (at least until I git me hands on a Holy Sword :), so I
was lookin at the Brutechopper. The stats look pretty reasonable (not quite
like a Shiny Hally, but I REALLY want to stick with the axes!). I
understand it is a quest for evil characters, but how is the quest
initiated? What is involved? How much are these weapons selling for? I
was figuring around 100 plat...a little under what the Hally is selling for
'cause it lacks the damage of the Hally.
Also, I was thinkin about heading up to High Hold and was wondering what lvl
you would need to be to get a Tomahawk or a Halberd...any feedback??
Thanks!
Thoradin of Bristlebane
Paladin of Brell
